page.title: 14Law & Order - Great Lever
page.content:
Locally, as in most places, burglaries and vandalism are increasing and the policeman can be seen on the beat. Many elderly people are afraid to go out in the evenings for fear of being mugged. Some are scared even in their own houses by the noise of youths messing about outside, often meaning no harm, but not always. Glue sniffers are seen quite often around Paulhan St. and under the railway bridges on Settle St.& Lever Edge Lane. Christian Ogden.
More and more old people live in {sheltered housing}like St. Vincent's Court. This is a complex of buildings where old people can rent their own flats which are warden-controlled. This gives them privacy, but help is at hand if needed.
